meeting_annotations.transcript: And I would argue that everything on our planet basically lives within that window because ultimately it had to get energy from that. And that's not really true. meeting_annotations.transcript: No, that's great and and to tie that back to what I think Andy was asking about, you know, what are the wavelength ranges that you can basically look for evidence of photosynthesis at least pigment wise.
